es.uned.jchacon.model_elements.process_control.continuous

Class DiscretePidController

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.uned.jchacon.model_elements.process_control.continuous.AbstractBlock
      • es.uned.jchacon.model_elements.process_control.continuous.DiscretePidController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Block, Discrete

    public class DiscretePidController
extends AbstractBlock
implements Discrete
    Author:
    jcsombria DiscretePidController Class to implement a discrete PID controller. ________ setpoint ---| | output ---| PID(z) |---- control action tracking ---|________|
